Alright everyone, I made the necessary changes for ModuleManager compatbility, [@Poodmund](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/128643-poodmund/) [@Galileo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/150430-galileo/) [@sDaZe](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/111181-sdaze/) [@Nhawks17](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/32999-nhawks17/) [@Proot](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/98932-proot/) let me know if there are any issues or you have any suggestions. Make sure you include the assetPath when you migrate your configs, see included configs for examples.

I also fixed the issues with <abbr title="Environmental Visual Enhancement (mod)">EVE</abbr> cloud shadows interfering with the atmosphere, you need both this version of scatterer and the <abbr title="Environmental Visual Enhancement (mod)">EVE</abbr> fix I already posted here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/103963-wip12-scatterer-atmospheric-scattering-v00250-28092016-12-compatibility/&do=findComment&comment=2773471](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/103963-wip12-scatterer-atmospheric-scattering-v00250-28092016-12-compatibility/&do=findComment&comment=2773471) [@KerbalMan23](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/160738-kerbalman23/) try this.

This version is released for both 1.2 and 1.1.3, the 1.1.3 version includes the ocean fix and multiple sun flares that weren't previously released for 1.1.3.

Links are in the <abbr title="Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it.">OP</abbr>.

Have fun.
